name: Yahya Bouchak
title: AI & Big Data Developer
about: Driven by a mission to bridge the gap between complex data and real-world solutions, I thrive on transforming challenging problems into elegant and intelligent systems. My passion lies not just in coding, but in architecting AI-powered tools that deliver tangible impact and measurable results.

projects.title: SIEM AI Dashboard
projects.description: A real-time SIEM dashboard that analyzes Wazuh alerts using a Large Language Model (LLM) to classify them as 'True Positive' or 'False Positive'.

projects.title: AI-Powered Attendance Tracking Portal
projects.description: Engineered an AI-powered portal for automated attendance tracking, using YOLOv8 for detection and ArcFace for high-accuracy recognition. The system is designed to streamline administrative tasks and improve record-keeping integrity.

projects.title: NASDAQ 100 Stock Price Prediction
projects.description: Developed a time-series forecasting model for the NASDAQ 100 index, leveraging TensorFlow to predict market movements. The goal was to build a tool for back-testing and validating potential trading strategies based on historical data patterns.

projects.title: Smart Finger & Emotion Detection
projects.description: Created a real-time human-computer interaction system using MediaPipe and DeepFace. The application interprets hand gestures and facial expressions, opening possibilities for intuitive, non-verbal software control and user state analysis.

projects.title: Face Detection & Clustering
projects.description: Implemented an unsupervised pipeline for face clustering in media. By combining InsightFace for feature extraction and HDBSCAN for density-based clustering, this project automatically identifies and groups individuals without prior labeling.

projects.title: NLP Sentiment Analysis
projects.description: Built a sentiment analysis tool using a fine-tuned DistilRoBERTa model deployed via Streamlit. The application provides instant emotional tone analysis of text, demonstrating the power of modern NLP for user feedback and social media monitoring.

projects.title: Gradient Descent Visualizer
projects.description: Developed an interactive tool to visualize various gradient descent and optimization functions in 2D and 3D, providing an intuitive understanding of their behavior.

resources.name: Kaggle
resources.description: An online community of data scientists and machine learning practitioners. Excellent for datasets, notebooks, and competitions.

resources.name: Hugging Face
resources.description: The go-to platform for pre-trained models and tools for natural language processing.

resources.name: Medium (Towards Data Science)
resources.description: A publication with high-quality articles and tutorials on data science, machine learning, and AI.

education.degree: Master's in Information Systems & Artificial Intelligence
Bachelor's in Information Systems & Artificial Intelligence
Higher Technician's Certificate (BTS) in Information Systems Development

responsibilities: Developed and maintained web applications using Laravel and React.
Collaborated with the AI team to integrate a recommendation engine.
Participated in the full software development lifecycle, from planning to deployment.
